episodes.title: This Incestuous Mormon “Blood Cult” Owns A Billion-Dollar Empire
episodes.description:
A dive into Utah's most secretive, polygamist cult. The Kingston Clan has been accused of incest, generations of inbreeding, blood tests, child abuse, sexual abuse, labor exploitation, fraud, and tax evasion. Recent controversies have brought this cult under the spotlight, although they've had run-ins with the law for almost a century. Prosecutors have labeled the Kingston Clan one of the largest organized crime operations in Utah.

Lights Out Merch: https://milehighermerch.com/
Higher Hope Foundation: https://higherhope.org

40:35 - "Keeping the Bloodline Pure"

1:07:37 - Survivors
1:19:41 - Polygamy Recriminalized

episodes.title: Sinister "Queen of Canada" Threatens Her Own Cult Followers with Public Executions
episodes.description:
The self-declared "Queen of Canada," born from an alien race, Romana Didulo, has been called many things— including "a glorified content creator" and a "Q-Anon cult leader." Through her pseudo-law decrees, she has attempted to violently overthrow various governments and laws with nothing to show for it. In recent years, she used threats of executions and scare tactics to take over a small town in Saskatchewan. But will her small following survive?

Romanma's Website: https://www.thekingdomofcanada.ca/
Blog: https://www.blogger.com/profile/17607050982503496860

episodes.title: The Most Evil Mormon in History... Ervil LeBaron & His Deadly Fundamentalist Polygamist Cult
episodes.description:
Dubbed the “Mormon Manson,” Ervil LeBaron wielded the ritual of “blood atonement” like a weapon. The staunch polygamist justified his heinous assassinations with religious doctrine. Any opponent was subject to execution. Any execution was deemed a religious rite of passage into Heaven. But after murdering his 17-year-old pregnant daughter, even his most devoted followers thought he had gone too far.
